description: This sprint focuses on initial feature development.

userStories.title: User Story 1
userStories.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to log in so that I can access my account.
userStories.description: This user story is focused on developing a login feature.
acceptanceCriteria: User can log in using their credentials and access their account.
notes: Consider implementing OAuth for enhanced security.

userStories.title: User Story 2
userStories.userStory: As a user, I want to be able to log out so that I can secure my account.
userStories.description: This user story is focused on developing a logout feature.
acceptanceCriteria: User can log out, and their session is terminated securely.
notes: Ensure that session termination is handled securely to prevent unauthorized access.
